alert.note: Alert for Cass; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 2:54AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Elkhart, northeastern St. Joseph, southwestern Cass and southeastern Berrien Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 254 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roseland, or near South Bend, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Bend, Elkhart, Mishawaka, Granger, Gulivoire Park, Simonton Lake, Dunlap, Osceola, Wakarusa, Edwardsburg, Roseland, Bertrand, Indian Village, Adamsville, Juno Lake, Woodland, Jimtown and Eagle Lake. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 71 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
